Container.Name: doplarr
Container.Overview: Doplarr(https://github.com/kiranshila/Doplarr) is an *arr request bot for Discord."
Container.Changes:
### 2024-06-24 - Rebase to Alpine 3.20.
### 2023-12-23 - Rebase to Alpine 3.19.
### 2023-05-25 - Rebase to Alpine 3.18.
### 2022-12-18 - Rebase to alpine 3.17, upgrade to openjdk17.
### 2022-05-01 - Remove `DISCORD__ROLE_ID` environment variable, see Permissions Configuration(https://github.com/kiranshila/Doplarr/blob/main/docs/configuration.md#permissions).
### 2022-01-30 - Variable adjustments.
### 2022-01-30 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Persistent config files

Config.Name: DISCORD__TOKEN
Config.Description: Specify your discord bot token.

Config.Name: OVERSEERR__API
Config.Description: Specify your Overseerr API key. Leave blank if using Radarr/Sonarr.

Config.Name: OVERSEERR__URL
Config.Description: Specify your Overseerr URL. Leave blank if using Radarr/Sonarr.

Config.Name: RADARR__API
Config.Description: Specify your Radarr API key. Leave blank if using Overseerr.

Config.Name: RADARR__URL
Config.Description: Specify your Radarr URL. Leave blank if using Overseerr.

Config.Name: SONARR__API
Config.Description: Specify your Sonarr API key. Leave blank if using Overseerr.

Config.Name: SONARR__URL
Config.Description: Specify your Sonarr URL. Leave blank if using Overseerr.

Config.Name: DISCORD__MAX_RESULTS
Config.Description: Sets the maximum size of the search results selection

Config.Name: DISCORD__REQUESTED_MSG_STYLE
Config.Description: Sets the style of the request alert message. One of `:plain` `:embed` `:none`

Config.Name: SONARR__QUALITY_PROFILE
Config.Description: The name of the quality profile to use by default for Sonarr

Config.Name: RADARR__QUALITY_PROFILE
Config.Description: The name of the quality profile to use by default for Radarr

Config.Name: SONARR__ROOTFOLDER
Config.Description: The root folder to use by default for Sonarr

Config.Name: RADARR__ROOTFOLDER
Config.Description: The root folder to use by default for Radarr

Config.Name: SONARR__LANGUAGE_PROFILE
Config.Description: The name of the language profile to use by default for Sonarr

Config.Name: OVERSEERR__DEFAULT_ID
Config.Description: The Overseerr user id to use by default if there is no associated discord account for the requester

Config.Name: PARTIAL_SEASONS
Config.Description: Sets whether users can request partial seasons.

Config.Name: LOG_LEVEL
Config.Description: The log level for the logging backend. This can be changed for debugging purposes. One of trace `:debug` `:info` `:warn` `:error` `:fatal` `:report`

Config.Name: JAVA_OPTS
Config.Description: For passing additional java options.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: Container Variable: PUID

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Container Variable: PGID

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: Container Variable: UMASK
